sentences.en: Her favorite Beatitude is " Blessed are the meek for they shall inherit the earth ".
sentences.cn: 她最喜欢的至福是 “ 保佑温顺的人,他们将继承土地 ”.

sentences.en: I think that if I were allowed to add one small beatitude as a footnote to the other it might be: Blessed are the courteous .
sentences.cn: 我想如果允许我在《圣经》中用脚注加上一小句祝福的话，那么这句话就是：“礼貌者有福。”

sentences.en: The word "beatitude" comes from the Latin word that means "blessed, " the first word in each statement.
sentences.cn: “八福”这个词来源于拉丁文，意思是“享受天国之福的”，出现在每个陈述的第一个字。

sentences.en: This beatitude encompasses the whole message of the Bible.
sentences.cn: 这个祝福，盖括了整本圣经的信息。

sentences.en: This beatitude is as vast as the Bible itself.
sentences.cn: 这个祝福，如同圣经本身一样广阔。

trans.tran_cn: 至福，天福，八福词，（东正教）法座
